website_summaries.verdict: A party favor that's both fun and functional, a perfect alternative to the usual toys and candy.
pros: Stackable crayons come with 8 colors and a durable plastic cap
A useful alternative to toys or candy
Color glides onto paper with ease
cons: Crayon pieces are small and easy to loose when not assembled

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & fun!
customer_reviews.text: I made the cutest Valentine’s for my daughters’ class with these stacking crayons. I was worried the shape of the crayon stick would bend while using them, but they were great. I colored with each color myself. The pen was surprisingly sturdy and the colors were bold. Shipping was fast too. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA W.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality crayon in it.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old likes this bc it has all the colors. I like that I have all colors in one stick in my purse for restaurants and trip all neat and tidy. However I don’t like the quality of crayon in it. It’s very hard and waxy so I don’t think it colors easily or well. My kid has to push down really hard to see color, me too, which sometimes makes the color pieces snap apart while holding and using. I bought as party favors but I wouldn’t recommend. Great idea but needs better crayon in it
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: All the colors work, super cute favors
customer_reviews.text: My son's school is having their annual fair and I am in charge of prizes. I was not sure about these because there weren't reviews when I purchased them, but I'm glad I took a chance. They are good for the price and all the colors work, which is what I was mostly concerned about. The light blue has the least pigment, but you can still see it on white paper. I think the kids will like this.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetymom

customer_reviews.title: Bought as return gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set to put in the return party bag for daughter's second. The quality is very good and the colour pay off is decent for the price. It doesn't mark toddlers' hands or other items around the house but colours quite decently on paper. My daughter also loved the stacking aspect of this and played with it more than coloured with it. After a while, the colour pieces do come out of the plastic casing so be careful of handing this to a younger baby that doesn't know not to eat it. Overall, I am pleased and they were a hit with most kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nagalakshmi V

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaiʻi so shipping on time is usually a problem for last minute buys. It was very nice to find what I needed at the last minute and at an affordable price. Received Huji Stackable Crayons exactly as ordered and in great shape. Loved that they were bagged together yet in two 24 Packs. Perfect for my daughterʻs 2nd birthday party diy coloring books I made for her treat bags. On top of that, they had the products delivered, undamaged, 4 days later. Super happy customer. Would definately order from Huji again and recommend to others. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved them, even the teacher
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a favor for my child's classroom for a birthday. Everyone loved them, even the teacher. Mostly great quality, although some colors can't be switched around and have the clear cover stay on.
customer_reviews.author: JBP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a super used gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my class Christmas gift bags & then so many came in the pack I was able to do my sons class bags as well & I think every mom stopped me to ask me about them. They are so fun. Small enough to be fun for writing notes & completing worksheets switching in different colors but my younger ones love coloring with them too! Each color is short so it’s easy to use your favorite color fast. But well received & well used by all who received them
customer_reviews.author: Mom6Phil36

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: we bought a large assortment of stuff like this for my sons teachers prize box this year. This was the best item we chose. My 9yr old takes his everywhere so at restaurants and other places, he has a way to color that needs no package and is very easy to remember
customer_reviews.author: shannon tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Party Favor!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Halloween Treat/Party Favor EVER!!! My kindergartener loves these, and she prefers them over her many boxes of Crayolas. She has a couple she uses all the time, and they are still fully in tact months later. I love that these are a sugar free, affordable “treat” to add to goodie bags, and I will be getting more of these for Easter baskets and Bday party favors!
customer_reviews.author: H.B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as party favors along with a coloring book. I like these because its very portable. It has one additional color than those from Target and seems more "steady" / less "wiggly. I watched my 5 yr use them and I don't see anything I would complain. Not sure if it's because my kid has grown up but the middle part/crayon part doesn't fall off like the Target ones.
customer_reviews.author: fishmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took these to school for her classmates as a birthday favor. They loved them! This style of stackable crayon is fun because the little crayons can not only be stacked vertically, but secured to each other horizontally as well. We kept quite a few for use at home and all my kids were having fun making patterns and securing them in different ways.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsai

customer_reviews.title: Nice stackable crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my daughter’s kindergarten class for Christmas gifts. They worked better than the other stackable colored pencils I read about in other reviews. Coloring doesn’t require pressure goes on easily. Definitely a good buy and fun!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Nice pen but needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as Christmas gifts to my students. My students loved them and started to play with them immediately. Unfortunately, I found that they started to lose the pieces as some of them did not fit well with each other. It’s been over three months now, and I do not find that any of the students have all pieces.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: great for kids parties
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's birthday party as party favors. Kids loved them. I had a few left afterwards so I took them with me on the plane when we were traveling. They don't take much space in your purse and yet your kid has all the colors for drawing. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! I gave it as a Back to School gift, and the children loved them! I would definitely use these as stocking stuffers, or even "just because" gifts. It makes the little ones feel so grown up. They are really quite adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Scholar Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality. I bought them for party favors and had a couple left over. My son uses them to do one of his weekly spelling assignments where they would normally use a crayon to rainbow write their list.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Kinder class loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons Valentine’s Day gifts for his kindergarten class! The price was amazing, and there were enough for the whole kindergarten class plus extra for my kiddos to keep at home!
customer_reviews.author: E. L

customer_reviews.title: Better than highlighters!
customer_reviews.text: Better than highlighters and you get a variety of colors too! Mark different events in your agenda that correspond with a particular color.
customer_reviews.author: The Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These were part of the favor bags for my daughter's birthday party and they were a hit. I keep some in my car and bag to take to restaurants since not everyone offers crayons for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Of 3

customer_reviews.title: Love hat they get all 8 primary colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my granddaughters birthday party gift bags this weekend. They're cute, had to show my granddaughters how they work. Told them there like leggo's but they were sure. They can't wait to get their gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Walker

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful convenience!
customer_reviews.text: We used these in our goodie bags for Friendsgiving. They are so convenient to travel with as well! No losing crayons on trips or finding broken ones in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vigliotta

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun stackable crayons, but colors are too light
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun crayons set, but the colors are very soft and don't show up well on paper. Kids have to press very hard, which makes it frustrating for them. I think they had more fun stacking and restacking vs. coloring with them. :-/
customer_reviews.author: sea tog

customer_reviews.title: Cute as favors and convenient for travel!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos loved these as a favor item for their birthday party! They play with them often and are convenient to take for trips as they take up so little space but provide all of the colors they need!
customer_reviews.author: PinkGiraffe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got these to give as return gifts for my kid’s birthday, it was very appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Shriya

customer_reviews.title: So useful! Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as party favor TWICE! Because it’s so useful too! Moms don’t have to carry around the whole pack of crayons anymore. Just one crayon with so many colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. I wasn't sure what to expect, but we used them for marking paper bingo cards and they work well plus are fun. None of them have broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...fun!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crayons! Loved the stacks! Looks like a lot of fun! I will buy these again! Kids had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Aswathy Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see them as a substitute for crayons or colored pencils. The quality is not there. However my kids love to use them, especially during homework assignments.
customer_reviews.author: ek

customer_reviews.title: Cute party bag filler
customer_reviews.text: Bought to fill party bags for my 3y/os birthday cute idea , they don’t color the greatest (AND the 2y/o colored all over everything with them bc the pieces seem to be around months later
customer_reviews.author: NicoletteCelestina

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: We gave these away to my daughter's classmates for her birthday in lieu of candy and they all loved them and were super excited to get them. It's a perfect little gifty.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5th Grader Prizes
customer_reviews.text: My son has a treasure box at school that the teacher asks for donations form parents. The kids earn tickets to get something in the treasure box. My son said they were the first thing to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jdesign

customer_reviews.title: I love them more than the kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift as favors, classrooms. Great quality, love them. Definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive- buy them from Target!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I really like these but- Target sells 10 pieces for $3.00!!! Wish I knew that before I purchased them from Amazon..... kinda angry but oh well....
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great student gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my students so they could color after State testing. It was a big boy with them! Even a couple of my co-workers liked them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqualine

customer_reviews.title: Very cool crayons! Kids love taking them apart and they color great too!
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Put them in a rotating container at my daughters farm themed birthday party and coloring sheets for kids to color while they ate cake.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for traveling with three kids (2, 4, and 6) they were perfect for taking to restaurants. Highly recommend to slip into a purse, and divide between multiple Kids.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXIA M

customer_reviews.title: Great for birthday bags!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for gift bags for my daughter's birthday and they were a big hit. Good quality, lots of fun to sketch and easier to carry/transport in your bag for outings. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LabMami

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons and value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as party favors by my daughter's art themed birthday party. I wanted something kids would actually find useful versus the normal junk people put in. These did not disappoint! You get a lot for your money, and they're super cool and unique. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Alexander Welland

customer_reviews.title: Great for School Spirit Store
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to sell at our school store. They are great! The kids loved them and the colors are bright and not too waxy.
customer_reviews.author: FKHamer

customer_reviews.title: Iove these for gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are awesome!! I got these for a birthday gift bag and all the kids loved them. I still see the kids use them every time we have a play date. Great buy!! They work well too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and easy to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: My son has to do parts of his homework with specific colors and somehow we can never seem to find said colors. With these crayons he has one in his backpack, I have one in my purse and extras in the drawer. No More excuses!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for goodie bags!
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome! I added them to a lego themed goodie bag and they were perfect. They stack nicely both vertically and horizontally! Not loose at all. Colors are as expected.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Lighter colors are faint- not very vivid at all
customer_reviews.text: Gave some to my 6 year old granddaughter for Valentine's day. She asked "why don't they work?" ( meaning the lighter colors) . darker colors showed up fine, but overall product is unsatisfactory.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy

customer_reviews.title: great in theory but lacking in execution
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in bulk for some wedding packages for kids. I loves the idea of keeping the crayons all together and it looks better than a box of crayons. The downside is the crayon quality was actually pretty disappointing. Very very light color no matter how hard you pressed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Nice alternative to traditional crayons for party favor bags. My son has been using his for days with no issues and they work as should.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my Pre-K class for a Valentine's Day gift. The kiddos loved being able to build their own crayons with these. It not just a fun way to color, but pulling the sections apart and stacking them is a great fine motor activity for kids to develop hand-eye coordination. The crayons lasted a while without breaking, even from hard pressing 3 year olds. I will be buying again for next years gifts!

product_meta.title: Huji 8-Color Stacking Buildable Crayons Set Kids Favors (Building-Blocks, 12)
product_meta.description: Break out your coloring books! The Huji Stacking Buildable Crayons are the must-have crayons to have. The buildable crayons come with 12 crayons and with 8 different colors. The colors its features are: yellow, orange, red, green, blue, purple, brown, black. The crayons can be stacked horizontally and sideways, vertically. The crayons also include an easy snap button bag for simple storage and clean up. The Huji Stacking Buildable Crayons are perfect for any Lego themed party and make an even better party favor. The crayons are 6.5” heights and come with a clear cap.
feature_bullets: Stacking Crayons comes with 12 buildable crayons and 8 different colors
Great for coloring at home during arts and crafts or for school coloring projects
Buildable Crayons comes with a plastic snap button bag, ideal for cleaning up and storage
Perfect party favor gift for any Lego themed party, kids will love building their own crayons
Building the crayons any way you like, stack them horizontal or vertical

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars264 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
